attributes.action: Make 26 July "National Talk Like Mick Jagger Day"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone in Britain should celebrate Mick's birthday by talking like him for one day a year, on his birthday. Mick is a British institution and he should be celebrated.  After all, imitation is the greatest form of flattery.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
